directions: Cook the turkey in a dutch oven over medium high heat until no longer pink - about 5 minutes.
Add onion and bell pepper and cook until softened - about 4 minutes. Stir in garlic and season with ground chipotle, salt and pepper to taste.
Add the quinoa, tomatoes, broth and beans to the pot and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer, stirring occassionaly, until quinoa is cooked about 15 minutes.
Top with chives, cheese and serve.
title: 30 minute turkey quinoa chili
